ITEM_0000.name: Potion
ITEM_0000.expl: Restores a small amount of health.

ITEM_0001.name: Mega Potion
ITEM_0001.expl: Restores a moderate amount of health.

ITEM_0003.name: Max Potion
ITEM_0003.expl: Fully restores health and temporarily maximizes the size of your Health Gauge.

ITEM_0004.name: Ancient Potion
ITEM_0004.expl: Fully restores health and temporarily maximizes the size of your Health and Stamina Gauges.

ITEM_0005.name: Nulberry
ITEM_0005.expl: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ITEM_0006.name: Ration
ITEM_0006.expl: Food that restores a bit of stamina. It can also be used on the Portable BBQ Grill to have a meal.

ITEM_0007.name: Well-done Steak
ITEM_0007.expl: A hearty roast that restores health and stamina and boosts both their max gauges. So tasty!

ITEM_0008.name: Rare Steak
ITEM_0008.expl: Restores health and stamina and moderately increases the size of your Health Gauge temporarily.

ITEM_0009.name: Burnt Meat
ITEM_0009.expl: Restores stamina, but it may be a bit too charred to provide any healing effects...

ITEM_0010.name: Lifepowder
ITEM_0010.expl: Produces a cloud that heals you and anyone nearby.

ITEM_0011.name: Raw Meat
ITEM_0011.expl: Meat carved from a monster. Can be cooked, combined,  or used to set a trap.

ITEM_0013.name: Large Barrel Bomb
ITEM_0013.expl: A bomb that can be rolled after placing it on the ground. Strike it to trigger a powerful blast.

ITEM_0014.name: Flash Pod
ITEM_0014.expl: Slinger ammo that causes a violent flash on impact. Will temporarily blind monsters if used in front of them.

ITEM_0015.name: Stone
ITEM_0015.expl: Slinger ammo that can be used to hit faraway plant life and bombs.

ITEM_0016.name: Capture Net
ITEM_0016.expl: A net that can be fired from your Slinger. Use it to capture small creatures.

ITEM_0017.name: Pitfall Trap
ITEM_0017.expl: A trap for catching large monsters. It is tripped by heavy weight.

ITEM_0018.name: Shock Trap
ITEM_0018.expl: A trap that immobilizes a target. Use it to capture monsters.

ITEM_0019.name: Whetstone
ITEM_0019.expl: A standard-sized whetstone. Use it to restore a weapon's sharpness.

ITEM_0021.name: Binoculars
ITEM_0021.expl: A tool that magnifies distant objects and lets you learn more about them.

ITEM_0022.name: Camping Kit
ITEM_0022.expl: A kit with all the tools to make camp. Use to set up and edit Pop-up Camps in available campsites.

ITEM_0023.name: Portable BBQ Grill
ITEM_0023.expl: A portable BBQ grill that can be used for grilling up raw meat and other ingredients.

ITEM_0027.name: Honey
ITEM_0027.expl: Highly nutritious honey. Combine with potions to make the more potent mega potion.

ITEM_0028.name: Bitterbug Broth
ITEM_0028.expl: Bitterbug essence that has innate healing abilities. Used as a component in many medicines.

ITEM_0029.name: Flashbug Phosphor
ITEM_0029.expl: Luminous essence from an insect that emits a powerful flash when it dies. Used to craft flash pods.

ITEM_0030.name: Godbug Essence
ITEM_0030.expl: Essence from an insect said to live a millennium. Combine it with other items to add their properties.

ITEM_0031.name: Thunderbug Capacitor
ITEM_0031.expl: Substance from an insect that emits electricity when struck. Required to craft Shock Traps and Thunder Ammo.

ITEM_0032.name: Doshaguma Hide
ITEM_0032.expl: A Doshaguma hide. The numerous scars on its body are proof of its beastly, aggressive nature.

ITEM_0033.name: Doshaguma Fur
ITEM_0033.expl: Doshaguma fur. It makes a durable crafting material thanks to its stiff, bristly texture.

ITEM_0034.name: Doshaguma Claw
ITEM_0034.expl: A Doshaguma claw. Sharp as it is tough, it can cut through muscled prey without a single chip.

ITEM_0035.name: Doshaguma Fang
ITEM_0035.expl: A Doshaguma fang. They grow large and sharp so they can pierce their prey with ease.

ITEM_0036.name: Beast Gem
ITEM_0036.expl: A valuable jewel formed from coagulated juices inside a monster. Glows wildly.

ITEM_0037.name: Normal Ammo
ITEM_0037.expl: Standard ammo. Fires multiple shots with each pull of the trigger. Unlimited capacity.

ITEM_0040.name: Pierce Ammo
ITEM_0040.expl: Armor-piercing ammo. Depending on the monster, it can deal multiple hits. Unlimited capacity.

ITEM_0043.name: Spread Ammo
ITEM_0043.expl: Ammo made for close combat. Short range but high power. Unlimited capacity.

ITEM_0046.name: Sticky Ammo
ITEM_0046.expl: Powerful ammo that lodges in a target and explodes. Headshots stun.

ITEM_0049.name: Cluster Bomb
ITEM_0049.expl: Ammo that fragments into multiple shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!

ITEM_0052.name: Flaming Ammo
ITEM_0052.expl: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to fire.

ITEM_0053.name: Water Ammo
ITEM_0053.expl: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to water.

ITEM_0054.name: Thunder Ammo
ITEM_0054.expl: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to thunder.

ITEM_0055.name: Freeze Ammo
ITEM_0055.expl: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to ice.

ITEM_0056.name: Dragon Ammo
ITEM_0056.expl: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters weak to dragon.

ITEM_0057.name: Poison Ammo
ITEM_0057.expl: Ammo that inflicts poison. Some targets require multiple shots in order for the status to take effect.

ITEM_0059.name: Paralysis Ammo
ITEM_0059.expl: Ammo that causes paralysis. Some targets require multiple shots in order for the status to take effect.

ITEM_0061.name: Sleep Ammo
ITEM_0061.expl: Ammo that induces sleep. Some targets require multiple shots in order for the status to take effect.

ITEM_0068.name: Slicing Ammo
ITEM_0068.expl: Ammo that ejects sharp blades on impact, which can sever tails.

ITEM_0072.name: Thorngrass Pod
ITEM_0072.expl: Slinger ammo that lodges into a target. Attacking where it's lodged deals extra damage.

ITEM_0074.name: Iron Ore
ITEM_0074.expl: Ore that can be smelted into a multi-purpose metal.

ITEM_0075.name: Machalite Ore
ITEM_0075.expl: Ore mined from mineral veins. Refined Machalite Steel is far sturdier than its iron cousin.

ITEM_0076.name: Dragonite Ore
ITEM_0076.expl: Ore sourced from mining outcrops. A rare material coveted for its durability in armor crafting.

ITEM_0077.name: Carbalite Ore
ITEM_0077.expl: Ore obtained from mining outcrops. Still under research, but known to yield highly pure metal.

ITEM_0078.name: Earth Crystal
ITEM_0078.expl: Crystallized microbes sourced from mining outcrops. Coveted as an abrasive for polishing equipment.

ITEM_0079.name: Mystery Bone
ITEM_0079.expl: A weathered bone taken from a bonepile. Erosion has left it too fragile to use in crafting.

ITEM_0080.name: Sturdy Bone
ITEM_0080.expl: A rigid bone taken from a bonepile. Durable but light and easy to handle.

ITEM_0081.name: Brute Bone
ITEM_0081.expl: A sturdy bone from a beast. Easy to use in crafting.

ITEM_0082.name: Colossal Bone
ITEM_0082.expl: A massive bone from a beast. Carefully cut out and used for crafting.

ITEM_0083.name: Dragonbone Relic
ITEM_0083.expl: A high-quality bone taken from a bonepile. The remains of a dragon that once roamed these lands.

ITEM_0087.name: Mandragora
ITEM_0087.expl: A dangerous fungus said to draw the life out of people. Required to craft immunizers and max potions.

ITEM_0088.name: Blue Mushroom
ITEM_0088.expl: A mushroom infused with power-enhancing effects. Used in restorative items.

ITEM_0090.name: Burst Pod
ITEM_0090.expl: Slinger ammo that detonates on impact. Use it to stagger a monster when you're in a pinch.

ITEM_0091.name: Screamer Pod
ITEM_0091.expl: Slinger ammo that emits a harsh, high-frequency sound that can disrupt sensitive monsters.

ITEM_0092.name: Bleeding Pod
ITEM_0092.expl: Slinger ammo that can be used to inflict massive damage on monster wounds.

ITEM_0093.name: Dung Pod
ITEM_0093.expl: Slinger ammo that releases a strong odor on impact. Causes certain monsters to flee.

ITEM_0096.name: Trap Tool
ITEM_0096.expl: A must-have item for putting together pitfall traps and shock traps.

ITEM_0097.name: Exciteshroom
ITEM_0097.expl: Has a very strange aroma. Is it edible? Is it deadly? Required to make farcasters.

ITEM_0098.name: Smokenut
ITEM_0098.expl: A nut that produces torrents of smoke. Combine with other items to add more effects.

ITEM_0099.name: Ivy
ITEM_0099.expl: A lightweight and extremely strong plant. Used to make nets for pitfall traps.

ITEM_0100.name: Farcaster
ITEM_0100.expl: Call for a wingdrake to transport you to the nearest camp. Can also be used during combat.

ITEM_0103.name: Balahara Shell
ITEM_0103.expl: A Balahara shell. The fulgurite it has absorbed enhances its hardness.

ITEM_0104.name: Balahara Scale
ITEM_0104.expl: A Balahara scale. The erosion caused by constant digging limits its usefulness in crafting.

ITEM_0105.name: Balahara Skull
ITEM_0105.expl: The skull of a Balahara. Stronger than most, it's built to withstand harsh dives into sand.

ITEM_0106.name: Balahara Tail
ITEM_0106.expl: A Balahara tail. Its unique, twisted shape allows it to propel itself through earth with great force.

ITEM_0107.name: Chatacabra Jaw
ITEM_0107.expl: The mandible plating of a Chatacabra. Hard protrusions stud the thick but supple leather.

ITEM_0108.name: Chatacabra Hide
ITEM_0108.expl: The thick hide of a Chatacabra. Elastic and easy to mold thanks to the monster's gluttonous diet.

ITEM_0109.name: Chatacabra Shell
ITEM_0109.expl: Plating that covers a Chatacabra's forelimbs. A lifetime of licking has left it both smooth and sturdy.

ITEM_0110.name: Chatacabra Scale
ITEM_0110.expl: A jagged scale from a Chatacabra's hide, especially tough and well suited for use in crafting armor.

ITEM_0111.name: Quematrice Scale
ITEM_0111.expl: The scale of a Quematrice. Its fine texture acts as a natural file used to grind and polish armor.

ITEM_0112.name: Quematrice Hide
ITEM_0112.expl: The hide of a Quematrice. Quite thick despite its wrinkly form, it is highly resistant to fire.

ITEM_0113.name: Quematrice Crest
ITEM_0113.expl: The crest of a Quematrice. Its flamboyant red color serves as a decoy to would-be predators.

ITEM_0114.name: Quematrice Tail
ITEM_0114.expl: The tail of a Quematrice. Its many pleats scrape against each other to create sparks.

ITEM_0115.name: Wyvern Gem
ITEM_0115.expl: Throughout a wyvern's life, impurities gather and form this peculiar gem.

ITEM_0116.name: Herbivore Shell
ITEM_0116.expl: Part of a shell taken from an herbivore. Relatively sturdy for a small monster material.

ITEM_0117.name: Bulaqchi Shell
ITEM_0117.expl: A Bulaqchi shell. Great for crafting thanks to its advanced durability and light weight.

ITEM_0118.name: Talioth Scale
ITEM_0118.expl: A Talioth scale. Conditioned in harsh environments, it is built to protect the body like armor.

ITEM_0119.name: Sharp Fang
ITEM_0119.expl: Fangs come in many shapes and sizes. Choose the right fang for the job.

ITEM_0120.name: Wingdrake Hide
ITEM_0120.expl: A material carved from wingdrakes. Lightweight and often used when crafting armor.

ITEM_0121.name: Acute Fang
ITEM_0121.expl: Fangs come in many shapes and sizes. This one is small but can still pierce scale.

ITEM_0122.name: Dung
ITEM_0122.expl: Its eye-watering stench makes useful Slinger ammo.

ITEM_0124.name: Rolled-up Dung
ITEM_0124.expl: A ball of condensed monster dung. Used to make dung pods for your Slinger.

ITEM_0125.name: Rathian Scale+
ITEM_0125.expl: A superior Rathian scale. Looks like a normal Rathian scale but is much harder.

ITEM_0126.name: Rathian Carapace
ITEM_0126.expl: Rathian carapace prized for its lavish green coloration. An excellent armor material.

ITEM_0127.name: Rathian Webbing
ITEM_0127.expl: A quality Rathian wing membrane. This heat-resistant material is often used as armor lining.

ITEM_0128.name: Rathian Spike+
ITEM_0128.expl: Rathian hairs, keen as a sword. Longer and sturdier than normal, they also contain more poison.

ITEM_0129.name: Rathian Ruby
ITEM_0129.expl: A rare, precious gem from inside a Rathian. Almost too nice to use.

ITEM_0139.name: Toadstool
ITEM_0139.expl: A mushroom with poison properties. Needed to craft Poison Ammo and smoke bombs.

ITEM_0140.name: Parashroom
ITEM_0140.expl: A mushroom that induces paralysis. Needed to craft Paralysis Ammo and tranq bombs.

ITEM_0141.name: Sleep Herb
ITEM_0141.expl: A plant containing sleeping agents. Needed to craft Sleep Ammo and tranq bombs.

ITEM_0142.name: Fire Herb
ITEM_0142.expl: A wondrous, flammable plant. Useful for crafting explosives and Flaming Ammo.

ITEM_0143.name: Flowfern
ITEM_0143.expl: This plant's leaves store a great amount of water. A component for making Water Ammo.

ITEM_0144.name: Snow Herb
ITEM_0144.expl: A plant that radiates ice-cold air. Use in combinations to create Freeze Ammo.

ITEM_0145.name: Dragonfell Berry
ITEM_0145.expl: A mysterious berry rumored for eons to be loathed by dragons. Required to craft Dragon Ammo.

ITEM_0146.name: First-aid Med
ITEM_0146.expl: Restores a small amount of health. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0147.name: EZ Ration
ITEM_0147.expl: Restores a small amount of stamina. Not usable with Portable BBQ Grill. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0148.name: EZ Flash Bomb
ITEM_0148.expl: Slinger ammo that explodes with a bright flash after it's fired. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0149.name: EZ Shock Trap
ITEM_0149.expl: A trap that immobilizes a target. Use it to capture monsters. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0150.name: EZ Pitfall Trap
ITEM_0150.expl: Activates a pitfall to catch monsters with. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0151.name: Gloamgrass Bud
ITEM_0151.expl: A plant with healing properties. Combine with Godbug essence to unleash its true potential.

ITEM_0152.name: Might Seed
ITEM_0152.expl: Temporarily strengthens your attacks when ingested by improving energy flow.

ITEM_0153.name: Adamant Seed
ITEM_0153.expl: Temporarily raises your defense when ingested by hardening tissue.

ITEM_0154.name: Nitroshroom
ITEM_0154.expl: A hard-to-find mushroom with the power to generate blazing heat. Required to craft gunpowder.

ITEM_0155.name: Devil's Blight
ITEM_0155.expl: A very rare fungus that pulses with extreme heat. Add to a barrel bomb for a dramatically stronger blast.

ITEM_0156.name: Blastnut
ITEM_0156.expl: A nut that explodes its hard contents on impact. Used to make Sticky Ammo.

ITEM_0157.name: Slashberry
ITEM_0157.expl: A berry that shatters into razor-like pieces. Used to make Slicing Ammo.

ITEM_0165.name: Rey Dau Scale
ITEM_0165.expl: A Rey Dau scale. Its unique shape allows electricity from its organs to pass through.

ITEM_0166.name: Rey Dau Shell
ITEM_0166.expl: The shell from a Rey Dau. Highly conductive and capable of producing large electrical currents.

ITEM_0167.name: Rey Dau Thunderhorn
ITEM_0167.expl: An electrically charged Rey Dau horn. The thick, flexible muscle at its base lets it move freely.

ITEM_0168.name: Rey Dau Wingtalon
ITEM_0168.expl: The claw-shaped energy conduit of a Rey Dau. Coated in sharp fulgurite blades formed by electric discharges.

ITEM_0169.name: Rey Dau Tail
ITEM_0169.expl: A Rey Dau tail. Its fulgurite- covered spines rub together to produce a threatening melody.

ITEM_0170.name: Rey Dau Plate
ITEM_0170.expl: A Rey Dau plate. The backward- facing scale accumulates a massive amount of energy.

ITEM_0171.name: Tranq Blade
ITEM_0171.expl: A knife coated with a tranquilizer that can be shot from your Slinger to put trapped monsters to sleep.

ITEM_0177.name: Smoke Bomb
ITEM_0177.expl: Creates a large cloud of smoke when thrown against the ground that can hide you from a monster's sight.

ITEM_0178.name: Powercharm
ITEM_0178.expl: An amulet that strengthens attacks. Just carrying this gives you demonic strength.

ITEM_0179.name: Armorcharm
ITEM_0179.expl: An amulet that increases defense. Just carrying this makes your skin stone hard.

ITEM_0180.name: Wyvern Ammo
ITEM_0180.expl: Ammo created through years of research into Wyvern's Fire. Short ranged, but destructive.

ITEM_0181.name: Grounding Pod
ITEM_0181.expl: Slinger ammo that can dissipate electricity from the area it lands.

ITEM_0182.name: Mystery Orb - Armor
ITEM_0182.expl: A sphere with faint power that is revealed through appraisal. Becomes a defensive decoration.

ITEM_0183.name: Glowing Orb - Armor
ITEM_0183.expl: A sphere with hidden power that is revealed through appraisal. Becomes a defensive decoration.

ITEM_0184.name: Ancient Orb - Armor
ITEM_0184.expl: A sphere with incredible power that is revealed through appraisal. Becomes a defensive decoration.

ITEM_0185.name: Damaged Weapon Shard
ITEM_0185.expl: An old, damaged weapon part. Needs to be appraised.

ITEM_0186.name: Rusted Weapon Shard
ITEM_0186.expl: An old, rusted weapon part. Needs to be appraised.

ITEM_0187.name: Ghillie Mantle
ITEM_0187.expl: Temporarily conceal yourself from view. The effect ends if you perform an attack or take damage.

ITEM_0188.name: Fishing Rod
ITEM_0188.expl: A tool for fishing. Cast the lure into bodies of water and use the reel to wind in the line.

ITEM_0189.name: Energy Drink
ITEM_0189.expl: A Guild-approved beverage that boosts your stamina. Helps shake off sleep, too!

ITEM_0190.name: Dash Juice
ITEM_0190.expl: Recovers stamina and also temporarily reduces stamina depletion when performing actions.

ITEM_0191.name: Immunizer
ITEM_0191.expl: Temporarily boosts your natural ability to recover lost health.

ITEM_0192.name: Cool Drink
ITEM_0192.expl: Provides temporary relief from extreme heat.

ITEM_0193.name: Hot Drink
ITEM_0193.expl: Provides temporary relief from extreme cold.

ITEM_0194.name: Demondrug
ITEM_0194.expl: Temporarily boosts your attack power by filling you with demonic strength.

ITEM_0195.name: Might Pill
ITEM_0195.expl: Temporarily endows you with the strength of a mighty god. Potent!

ITEM_0196.name: Mega Demondrug
ITEM_0196.expl: Temporarily boosts your attack power even more than a regular Demondrug.

ITEM_0197.name: Armorskin
ITEM_0197.expl: Temporarily boosts your defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.

ITEM_0198.name: Adamant Pill
ITEM_0198.expl: Temporarily makes your skin as hard as adamant. Potent!

ITEM_0199.name: Mega Armorskin
ITEM_0199.expl: Temporarily boosts your defense even more than regular Armorskin.

ITEM_0200.name: Herbal Medicine
ITEM_0200.expl: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

ITEM_0201.name: Herbal Powder
ITEM_0201.expl: Produces a cloud that cures poison and heals you a bit.

ITEM_0202.name: Demon Powder
ITEM_0202.expl: A mysterious powder that produces a cloud around the area that temporarily strengthens attacks.

ITEM_0203.name: Hardshell Powder
ITEM_0203.expl: A mysterious powder; when dispersed, temporarily strengthens defense.

ITEM_0204.name: Dust of Life
ITEM_0204.expl: Produces a cloud that restores a large amount of health for you and anyone nearby.

ITEM_0205.name: Cleanser
ITEM_0205.expl: Immediately removes any frost or webbing on your body.

ITEM_0206.name: Poison Smoke Bomb
ITEM_0206.expl: Releases a cloud of toxic mist when used. Also popular as a household bug bomb.

ITEM_0207.name: Tranq Bomb
ITEM_0207.expl: A hand grenade used to capture monsters ensnared in traps. Can be slammed against the ground.

ITEM_0208.name: Throwing Knife
ITEM_0208.expl: A knife that can be equipped to your Slinger. Can be coated with a range of substances.

ITEM_0209.name: Poison Pod
ITEM_0209.expl: Slinger ammo that inflicts  poison on a target upon  impact.

ITEM_0210.name: Para Pod
ITEM_0210.expl: Slinger ammo that inflicts paralysis on a target upon impact.

ITEM_0212.name: Drugged Meat
ITEM_0212.expl: Raw meat that puts whatever eats it to sleep. Makes great bait for traps.

ITEM_0214.name: Brightmoss
ITEM_0214.expl: Slinger ammo that illuminates dark areas when fired and can dazzle flying monsters.

ITEM_0215.name: Torch Pod
ITEM_0215.expl: Slinger ammo that can be used to scare away creatures that don't like fire and draw in those that do.

ITEM_0216.name: Puddle Pod
ITEM_0216.expl: Slinger ammo imbued with water element. Can remove some statuses on monsters.

ITEM_0217.name: Bomb Pod
ITEM_0217.expl: Slinger ammo that explodes on impact.

ITEM_0218.name: Piercing Pod
ITEM_0218.expl: Slinger ammo that deals piercing damage on impact.

ITEM_0221.name: Paint Pod
ITEM_0221.expl: Slinger ammo that makes a monster or location temporarily easier to find.

ITEM_0222.name: Luring Pod
ITEM_0222.expl: Slinger ammo that can be used to lure monsters toward yourself.

ITEM_0223.name: Mega Barrel Bomb
ITEM_0223.expl: An upgraded large barrel bomb. Effective against large monsters. Can be rolled after placement.

ITEM_0224.name: First-aid Med+
ITEM_0224.expl: Restores a moderate amount of health. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0225.name: EZ Max Potion
ITEM_0225.expl: Fully restores health and maximizes the size of your Health Gauge. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0226.name: EZ Lifepowder
ITEM_0226.expl: Produces a cloud that heals you and anyone nearby. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0227.name: EZ Herbal Powder
ITEM_0227.expl: Cures poison and restores a bit of health for everyone nearby. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0228.name: EZ Demon Powder
ITEM_0228.expl: Temporarily strengthens attacks for everyone nearby. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0229.name: EZ Hardshell Powder
ITEM_0229.expl: Temporarily increases defense for everyone nearby. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0230.name: EZ Dust of Life
ITEM_0230.expl: Releases a cloud that restores a large amount of health. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0231.name: EZ Tranq Bomb
ITEM_0231.expl: A hand grenade used to capture monsters ensnared in traps. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0232.name: EZ Dung Pod
ITEM_0232.expl: Releases a strong odor on impact. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0233.name: EZ Sonic Bomb
ITEM_0233.expl: Slinger ammo that emits an earsplitting sonic blast. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0234.name: Tinged Meat
ITEM_0234.expl: Raw meat that paralyzes whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.

ITEM_0235.name: EZ Large Barrel Bomb
ITEM_0235.expl: An improved large barrel bomb. Can be rolled after being placed. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0236.name: EZ Farcaster
ITEM_0236.expl: Call for a wingdrake to transport you to the nearest camp. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0237.name: Poisoned Meat
ITEM_0237.expl: Raw meat that poisons whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.

ITEM_0238.name: Deodorant
ITEM_0238.expl: Produces a cloud of cleansing smoke that cures blastblight and stench.

ITEM_0239.name: Kunafa Cheese
ITEM_0239.expl: An artisan cheese made in Kunafa, deliciously gooey when heated, and a great addition to any dish.

ITEM_0240.name: Sharp Kunafa Cheese
ITEM_0240.expl: A rich, decadent cheese made by skilled craftspeople. A great addition to any dish.

ITEM_0241.name: Droolshroom
ITEM_0241.expl: A mushroom that grows in a secret spot known only to Wudwuds. A great addition to any dish.

ITEM_0242.name: Delishroom
ITEM_0242.expl: An extremely rare delicacy that is cause for a Wudwud celebration. A great addition to any dish.

ITEM_0243.name: Mud Shrimp
ITEM_0243.expl: A nutritious shrimp native to Oilwell Basin and favored in Azuz. A great addition to any dish.

ITEM_0244.name: Turbid Shrimp
ITEM_0244.expl: A large, chewy shrimp packed to the gills with nutrients. A great addition to any dish.

ITEM_0245.name: Fluffy Egg
ITEM_0245.expl: An egg with a yolk and white as fluffy as the Downy Crake that laid it. A great addition to any dish.

ITEM_0246.name: Airy Egg
ITEM_0246.expl: A high-quality egg that sends you straight to flavor heaven. A great addition to any dish.

ITEM_0247.name: Sild Garlic
ITEM_0247.expl: A highly nutritious and fragrant bulb of garlic grown in Sild. A great addition to any dish.

ITEM_0248.name: Specialty Sild Garlic
ITEM_0248.expl: The ultimate bulb of garlic, grown in just the right conditions. A great addition to any dish.

ITEM_0249.name: Wild Herb
ITEM_0249.expl: This herb's refreshing aroma can mask any foul odor. A great finishing touch to any dish.

ITEM_0250.name: Eastern Honey
ITEM_0250.expl: Has a unique flavor, making it the perfect secret ingredient. A great finishing touch to any dish.

ITEM_0251.name: Monster Chili
ITEM_0251.expl: A powerful spice that enhances flavor and sweat production. A great finishing touch to any dish.

ITEM_0252.name: Jeweled Mullet Roe
ITEM_0252.expl: These fish eggs truly shine like diamonds. A great finishing touch to any dish.

ITEM_0253.name: Wild Seed Oil
ITEM_0253.expl: Oil that packs both flavor and the power of nature. A great finishing touch to any dish.

ITEM_0254.name: Truffle Du Conga
ITEM_0254.expl: Often dug up by its namesake, Congalala. A great finishing touch to any dish.

ITEM_0255.name: Sinister Cloth
ITEM_0255.expl: Suspicious cloth found somewhere in the Windward Plains. Drips with an aura of pure evil.

ITEM_0256.name: Great Hornfly
ITEM_0256.expl: Found in the Scarlet Forest. An insect with a giant horn, huge shell, and butterfly wings.

ITEM_0257.name: Windward Aloe
ITEM_0257.expl: Found in the Windward Plains. The water stored within its plump leaves has saved many a parched traveler.

ITEM_0258.name: Fine Windward Aloe
ITEM_0258.expl: A rarity from the Windward Plains. A single drop of its delicious sap transforms water into ambrosia.

ITEM_0259.name: Great Windward Aloe
ITEM_0259.expl: A treasure of the Windward Plains. Its leaves hold enough water to fill a bath in the driest desert.

ITEM_0260.name: Sandpepper
ITEM_0260.expl: Found in the Windward Plains. This dried spice lends a rich and aromatic heat to any dish.

ITEM_0261.name: Fiery Sandpepper
ITEM_0261.expl: A rarity from the Windward Plains. A spice so hot that a single bite opens the taster's third eye.

ITEM_0262.name: Fulgurite Shard
ITEM_0262.expl: Found in the Windward Plains. The shape of this fulgurite was sculpted by a chance lightning strike.

ITEM_0263.name: Pure Fulgurite
ITEM_0263.expl: A rarity from the Windward Plains. Crystallized fulgurite, free of any impurity. Extremely delicate.

ITEM_0264.name: Thundering Fulgurite
ITEM_0264.expl: A treasure of the Windward Plains. A colossal fulgurite crystal, born of a sky-splitting thunderstrike.

ITEM_0265.name: Scarlet Amber Shard
ITEM_0265.expl: Amber from the Scarlet Forest. The bodies of fossilized insects float in its scarlet confines.

ITEM_0266.name: Fine Scarlet Amber
ITEM_0266.expl: Rare amber from the Scarlet Forest. Immaculate insect specimens sleep in this amber, red as fine liquor.

ITEM_0267.name: Eternal Scarlet Amber
ITEM_0267.expl: Colossal amber from the Scarlet Forest. Ancient life has been sealed away inside it for eons.

ITEM_0268.name: Queensbloom Pollen
ITEM_0268.expl: Pollen from a giant flower in the Scarlet Forest, as regal as it is massive. Makes a heady perfume.

ITEM_0269.name: Shiny Treasure
ITEM_0269.expl: An ancient artifact Wudwuds found in the Scarlet Forest. Purely aesthetic in nature.

ITEM_0270.name: Sparkly Treasure
ITEM_0270.expl: A rarity of the Scarlet Forest. The fine detail and lavish use of gold show quite advanced techniques.

ITEM_0271.name: Bulky Treasure
ITEM_0271.expl: The sheer scale of this Scarlet Forest rarity makes it the object of obsession for all Wudwuds.

ITEM_0272.name: Auric Oil
ITEM_0272.expl: Exceptionally pure, golden mineral oil from Oilwell Basin. Used widely in Flameborn crafts.

ITEM_0273.name: Antimite
ITEM_0273.expl: A mineral from Oilwell Basin with a unique sheen. Used by the Flameborn in alloy production.

ITEM_0274.name: Fine Antimite
ITEM_0274.expl: An Oilwell Basin rarity too pure to be worked by any but the Flameborn artisans.

ITEM_0275.name: Antimite Mass
ITEM_0275.expl: A hulking antimite formation that produces strange reactions not yet understood by science.

ITEM_0276.name: Hirabami Molting
ITEM_0276.expl: Skin shed from a Hirabami. Treasured by the people of the Iceshard Cliffs as a curative.

ITEM_0277.name: Wyvernscale Vase
ITEM_0277.expl: An ancient ornamental vase found in the Iceshard Cliffs. The techniques used to craft it are lost to time.

ITEM_0278.name: Dragonscale Vase
ITEM_0278.expl: Each individual scale ornamenting this vase from the Iceshard Cliffs sparkles with a fiery brilliance.

ITEM_0279.name: Large Goldenscale Vase
ITEM_0279.expl: An exquisite, inscribed vase from the Iceshard Cliffs. A treasure worthy of kings, lost to the world.

ITEM_0280.name: Wyveria Lantern
ITEM_0280.expl: Fruit encased in a mesh shell, found in the Ruins of Wyveria. A precious source of sustenance to the natives.

ITEM_0281.name: Mature Wyveria Lantern
ITEM_0281.expl: A rarity in the Ruins of Wyveria. The ripening process imbues the fruit with medicinal properties.

ITEM_0282.name: Origin Wylk Gem

ITEM_0283.name: Milky Cocoon Web
ITEM_0283.expl: A curious fiber found in the Ruins of Wyveria. A resource treasured by the Keepers.

ITEM_0284.name: Wylk Pebble
ITEM_0284.expl: Small stones found across the East. A rich source of energy, they are often burned for fuel.

ITEM_0285.name: Wylk Gem
ITEM_0285.expl: A beautiful, faintly luminescent stone occasionally found inside Wylkdrops harvested in the East.

ITEM_0286.name: Time-honed Wylk Gem
ITEM_0286.expl: The size of this rare find from the East is the result of an eons- long natural formation process.

ITEM_0287.name: Ancient Fossil
ITEM_0287.expl: The blackened, stony remains of old bones unearthed in the East. When polished, it gains a velvety sheen.

ITEM_0288.name: Drifting Sea Pot
ITEM_0288.expl: A species of translucent sea squirts found in the East. When salt-dried, it becomes a fine preserved food.

ITEM_0289.name: Royal Sea Pot
ITEM_0289.expl: A rare, meatier species of sea squirt found in the East. Keeps its rich flavor, even when preserved.

ITEM_0290.name: Gobletweed
ITEM_0290.expl: Algae that grows in the East. It resembles a ceremonial cup— Cheers for finding such a beauty!

ITEM_0291.name: Chaliceweed
ITEM_0291.expl: Care must be taken not to disturb the delicate form of this rare and stunning algae when harvesting it.

ITEM_0292.name: Nightflower Pollen
ITEM_0292.expl: Pollen from a flower that blooms under a full moon. It exudes an ethereal pale glow.

ITEM_0293.name: Fossilized Opal
ITEM_0293.expl: A mass of organic material fossilized into opal over time. It has a deep crimson shine.

ITEM_0294.name: Fossilized Fire Opal
ITEM_0294.expl: This gorgeous fossil is marked by an exceptionally clear and fiery opal. A truly radiant rarity.

ITEM_0295.name: Genesis Opal
ITEM_0295.expl: The opal inclusion in this fossil burns with the fire of creation that first shaped this world.

ITEM_0296.name: Wyvernsprout
ITEM_0296.expl: A parasitic fungus that grows on the bodies of dead monsters. Prized as a symbol of reincarnation.

ITEM_0297.name: Whetfish Fin
ITEM_0297.expl: A fish fin that greatly restores sharpness and requires fewer strokes than a whetstone.

ITEM_0298.name: Sushifish Scale
ITEM_0298.expl: A scale from a Sushifish. Slightly restores health and treats bleeding.

ITEM_0299.name: Lala Barina Shell

ITEM_0300.name: Lala Barina Claw
ITEM_0300.expl: A claw from a Lala Barina. Vivid scarlet decorates its keen edge.

ITEM_0301.name: Lala Barina Stinger
ITEM_0301.expl: The stinger from a Lala Barina. Sharp as a sword, one thrust is all it takes to subdue prey.

ITEM_0302.name: Lala Barina Certificate
ITEM_0302.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Lala Barina. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0303.name: Lala Barina Floret
ITEM_0303.expl: Hair from a Lala Barina. So white and pristine that it could pass for a high quality pelt.

ITEM_0304.name: Screamer Pod
ITEM_0304.expl: Used as ammo for your Slinger. Emits a harsh, high-frequency sound that can disrupt sensitive monsters.

ITEM_0307.name: Krano Copper
ITEM_0307.expl: Copper pyrite from a Kranodath's shell. Its luster makes it a prime material for decorations.

ITEM_0308.name: Krano Pyrite

ITEM_0311.name: Thunder Pod
ITEM_0311.expl: Slinger ammo imbued with thunder element.

ITEM_0312.name: Frost Pod
ITEM_0312.expl: Slinger ammo imbued with ice element.

ITEM_0313.name: Dragon Pod
ITEM_0313.expl: Slinger ammo imbued with dragon element.

ITEM_0314.name: Fresh Honey
ITEM_0314.expl: Special honey gathered from Y'sai's spot. Can be delivered to Provisions, who's running low.

ITEM_0315.name: Frostburst
ITEM_0315.expl: Slinger ammo imbued with the ice element. Use it to stagger a monster when you're in a pinch.

ITEM_0316.name: Dragonstrike Nut
ITEM_0316.expl: A nut that explodes on impact. Used to make Wyvern Ammo.

ITEM_0317.name: Bomberry
ITEM_0317.expl: A berry that ruptures on impact. Used to make cluster bombs.

ITEM_0318.name: Chatacabra Certificate
ITEM_0318.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Chatacabra. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0319.name: Chatacabra Scale+

ITEM_0320.name: Chatacabra Jaw+
ITEM_0320.expl: Fine plating from a Chatacabra's hulking jaw. Its density and heft are quite impressive.

ITEM_0321.name: Chatacabra Hide+
ITEM_0321.expl: A high-quality Chatacabra hide. Tempered by its harsh environment. Makes a fine crafting material.

ITEM_0322.name: Chatacabra Carapace
ITEM_0322.expl: Stout plating from a Chatacabra's arms. Constant friction with the ground has polished it to gleam.

ITEM_0323.name: Chatacabra Certificate S
ITEM_0323.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Chatacabra. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0324.name: Xu Wu Certificate S

ITEM_0325.name: Quematrice Igniter
ITEM_0325.expl: Flammable fluids from a Quematrice, expelled as a gas then ignited by sparks from its coarse tail.

ITEM_0326.name: Quematrice Certificate
ITEM_0326.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Quematrice. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0327.name: Quematrice Scale+

ITEM_0328.name: Quematrice Hide+

ITEM_0329.name: Quematrice Igniter+
ITEM_0329.expl: Especially viscous fluid from a Quematrice. The gas it releases burns at a perilous temperature.

ITEM_0330.name: Quematrice Crest+
ITEM_0330.expl: The large crest of a Quematrice. Colored an angry red and shaken violently in a show of aggression.

ITEM_0331.name: Quematrice Certificate S
ITEM_0331.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Quematrice. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0332.name: Lala Barina Floret+
ITEM_0332.expl: High-quality hair from a Lala Barina. Its delicate, transparent strands dance in the wind.

ITEM_0333.name: Lala Barina Carapace
ITEM_0333.expl: The hard carapace of a Lala Barina. A bit of polish will make it shine black as night.

ITEM_0334.name: Lala Barina Claw+
ITEM_0334.expl: A sharp claw from a Lala Barina. The deep crimson tip mirrors the blood of countless victims.

ITEM_0335.name: Lala Barina Stinger+
ITEM_0335.expl: The razor-sharp stinger of a Lala Barina. Capable of piercing even the thickest armor.

ITEM_0336.name: Lala Barina Certificate S
ITEM_0336.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Lala Barina. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0337.name: Balahara Certificate
ITEM_0337.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Balahara. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0338.name: Balahara Scale+
ITEM_0338.expl: A high-quality Balahara scale. Thick and durable enough to carve through stone without a scratch.

ITEM_0339.name: Balahara Carapace

ITEM_0340.name: Balahara Skull+

ITEM_0341.name: Balahara Certificate S
ITEM_0341.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Balahara. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0342.name: Doshaguma Certificate

ITEM_0343.name: Doshaguma Fur+

ITEM_0344.name: Doshaguma Hide+

ITEM_0347.name: Doshaguma Certificate S
ITEM_0347.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Doshaguma. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0348.name: Uth Duna Scale

ITEM_0361.name: Uth Duna Certificate S
ITEM_0361.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted an Uth Duna. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0362.name: Rompopolo Hide

ITEM_0366.name: Rompopolo Certificate

ITEM_0368.name: Rompopolo Claw+

ITEM_0370.name: Rompopolo Beak+

ITEM_0371.name: Rompopolo Certificate S

ITEM_0372.name: Rey Dau Certificate

ITEM_0378.name: Rey Dau Certificate S
ITEM_0378.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Rey Dau. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0379.name: Hirabami Scale

ITEM_0380.name: Hirabami Hide

ITEM_0385.name: Hirabami Hide+

ITEM_0387.name: Hirabami Tail Claw+

ITEM_0388.name: Hirabami Certificate S
ITEM_0388.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Hirabami. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0390.name: Ajarakan Shell

ITEM_0450.expl: A rare jewel developed within a Jin Dahaad. Said to wield the power to freeze entire cliffs.

ITEM_0451.name: Jin Dahaad Certificate S
ITEM_0451.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Jin Dahaad. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0452.name: Guardian Ebony Scale
ITEM_0452.expl: A scale from a Guardian Ebony Odogaron. Energy coursing through it has turned parts of it white.

ITEM_0453.name: Guardian Ebony Sinew
ITEM_0453.expl: Tightly packed sinew from a Guardian Ebony Odogaron. Especially strong and heavy.

ITEM_0454.name: Guardian Ebony Claw
ITEM_0454.expl: A Guardian Ebony Odogaron claw. Made for ripping things open, even the slightest touch is dangerous.

ITEM_0455.name: Guardian Ebony Fang
ITEM_0455.expl: A Guardian Ebony Odogaron fang. Its sharp point allows it to pierce the vitals of any prey.

ITEM_0456.name: Guardian Ebony Tail
ITEM_0456.expl: A Guardian Ebony Odogaron tail. Covered in bristled scales that call to mind its terrible rage.

ITEM_0457.name: Guardian Ebony Plate
ITEM_0457.expl: A Guardian Ebony Odogaron plate. Energy has bolstered its draconic power to incredible heights.

ITEM_0458.name: G. Ebony Odogaron Certificate
ITEM_0458.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Guardian Ebony Odogaron. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0459.name: Guardian Ebony Scale+
ITEM_0459.expl: A high-quality Guardian Ebony Odogaron scale. The flow of pure energy has strengthened it.

ITEM_0460.name: Guardian Ebony Sinew+
ITEM_0460.expl: A large piece of sinew from a Guardian Ebony Odogaron. Excess energy has strengthened it greatly.

ITEM_0461.name: Guardian Ebony Claw+
ITEM_0461.expl: A sharp claw from a Guardian Ebony Odogaron. Its saw-like form lets it mercilessly rip apart its prey.

ITEM_0462.name: Guardian Ebony Fang+
ITEM_0462.expl: A sharp Guardian Ebony Odogaron fang. Shrouded in misfortune, only the bravest dare touch it.

ITEM_0463.name: Guardian Ebony Gem
ITEM_0463.expl: A rare jewel that developed within a Guardian Ebony Odogaron. Said to hold a strange draconic power.

ITEM_0464.name: G. Ebony Odogaron Certificate S
ITEM_0464.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Guardian Ebony Odogaron. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0465.name: Nourishing Extract
ITEM_0465.expl: Can be obtained from some large monsters. Has the ability to amplify the effects of certain medicines.

ITEM_0466.name: Xu Wu Hide
ITEM_0466.expl: The hide of a Xu Wu. Covered in mucus and uniquely flexible, it's quite a trial to work with.

ITEM_0467.name: Golden Corneum
ITEM_0467.expl: The golden corneum of a Xu Wu. Formed by hardened secretions that glisten with a disturbing light.

ITEM_0468.name: Xu Wu Tentacle
ITEM_0468.expl: A Xu Wu tentacle. It's flexible musculature makes it perfect for weapon and armor crafting.

ITEM_0469.name: Xu Wu Claw
ITEM_0469.expl: A claw from a Xu Wu. Sharp as a knife and able to pierce prey without a sound.

ITEM_0470.name: Xu Wu Fang
ITEM_0470.expl: A fang from a Xu Wu. Tough enough to crush any matter of prey.

ITEM_0471.name: Xu Wu Cerebrospinal Fluid
ITEM_0471.expl: Cerebrospinal fluid from a Xu Wu. A great deal of energy is concealed within, causing it to glow.

ITEM_0472.name: Xu Wu Certificate
ITEM_0472.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Xu Wu. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0473.name: Xu Wu Hide+
ITEM_0473.expl: A high-quality Xu Wu hide. Tough enough to repel a Guardian's claws and fangs.

ITEM_0474.name: Golden Corneum+
ITEM_0474.expl: A glittering golden corneum of a Xu Wu. Further hardened by its extremely pure secretions.

ITEM_0475.name: Xu Wu Tentacle+
ITEM_0475.expl: A high-quality Xu Wu tentacle. Continues to squirm while being processed, displaying its vitality.

ITEM_0476.name: Xu Wu Claw+
ITEM_0476.expl: A sharp claw from a Xu Wu. It's longer and keener, allowing it to more easily bring down prey.

ITEM_0477.name: Xu Wu Fang+
ITEM_0477.expl: A sharp fang from a Xu Wu. Dyed with the blood of all the prey it has mercilessly crushed.

ITEM_0478.name: Xu Wu Umbragem
ITEM_0478.expl: A rare jewel developed within a Xu Wu's body. Harbors a deep and impenetrable darkness.

ITEM_0480.name: Guardian Scale
ITEM_0480.expl: Contains an unknown substance. It has lost any color it previously had and possesses unique properties.

ITEM_0481.name: Guardian Scale+
ITEM_0481.expl: A high-quality Guardian scale. Sparkles like snow, as if it had always been pure white.

ITEM_0482.name: Arkveld Tail
ITEM_0482.expl: The tail of an Arkveld. Highly prized for the thick muscle hidden beneath its skin and hair.

ITEM_0483.name: Large Dung Pod
ITEM_0483.expl: Slinger ammo that releases a strong odor on impact, causing any surrounding monsters to flee.

ITEM_0484.name: EZ Large Dung Pod
ITEM_0484.expl: Releases a foul odor over a wide area on impact. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0485.name: Arkveld Scale+
ITEM_0485.expl: A high-quality Arkveld scale. Despite being incredibly dense and hard, the edges chip easily.

ITEM_0486.name: Arkveld Armorplate
ITEM_0486.expl: A durable Arkveld carapace. Named for how its scales overlap like plate armor.

ITEM_0488.name: White Arkveld Pelt
ITEM_0488.expl: A white Arkveld pelt. Strong, naturally twining strands create extra protection against attacks.

ITEM_0489.name: Arkveld Calloushell
ITEM_0489.expl: A linked Arkveld carapace that is connected by flexible sinew, allowing it to move like a chain.

ITEM_0490.name: Arkveld Horn+
ITEM_0490.expl: A sharp, pointed Arkveld horn. So menacing, its mere sight dispirits any who must stand against it.

ITEM_0491.name: Arkveld Gem
ITEM_0491.expl: A mysterious gem that formed inside an Arkveld. Its pulsating white light seems to absorb life.

ITEM_0492.name: Arkveld Certificate S
ITEM_0492.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted an Arkveld. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0493.name: Heavy Blunt Pod
ITEM_0493.expl: Slinger ammo that inflicts massive blunt damage where it lands.

ITEM_0494.name: Heavy Slicing Pod
ITEM_0494.expl: Slinger ammo that inflicts massive severing damage where it lands.

ITEM_0495.name: Heavy Explosion Pod
ITEM_0495.expl: Slinger ammo that explodes on impact, causing massive damage.

ITEM_0496.name: Basic Material
ITEM_0496.expl: Assorted materials from target monster obtained as bonus rewards.

ITEM_0497.name: Valuable Material
ITEM_0497.expl: Valuable materials from target monster obtained as bonus rewards.

ITEM_0498.name: Drearisite Scraps
ITEM_0498.expl: Metal scraps manufactured in Azuz. Can be used as a material once smelted.

ITEM_0499.name: Scarred Scale
ITEM_0499.expl: A material found in the Iceshard Cliffs. Despite its scarring, it remains tough as any other scale.

ITEM_0500.name: Ancient Wyvern Coin
ITEM_0500.expl: A rarity found in the East. A coin bearing a delicate etched relief, long out of use.

ITEM_0501.name: Heavy Piercing Pod
ITEM_0501.expl: Slinger ammo that inflicts massive piercing damage on impact.

ITEM_0503.name: Chillshroom
ITEM_0503.expl: This frosty mushroom is a primary ingredient in cool drinks.

ITEM_0504.name: Hot Pepper
ITEM_0504.expl: A plant spicy enough to set your mouth on fire. Used for making hot drinks.

ITEM_0505.name: Ancient Weapon Fragment
ITEM_0505.expl: Part of an ancient weapon. Needs to be appraised.

ITEM_0506.name: Nerscylla Shear
ITEM_0506.expl: A flexible, venomous Nerscylla fang. Beware its lethal poison when handling it!

ITEM_0507.name: Guardian Fulgur Scale+
ITEM_0507.expl: A high-quality Guardian Fulgur Anjanath scale. Surprisingly heavy, and zaps you when touched.

ITEM_0508.name: Guardian Fulgur Pelt+
ITEM_0508.expl: A high-quality Guardian Fulgur Anjanath pelt. Wild patterns have overshadowed its original form.

ITEM_0509.name: Guardian Fulgur Fang+
ITEM_0509.expl: A sharp fang from a Guardian Fulgur Anjanath. Built to withstand the fierce crushing power of its jaw.

ITEM_0510.name: Guardian Fulgur Nosebone+
ITEM_0510.expl: The nasal bone of a Guardian Fulgur Anjanath. The mucus from it is charged with electricity.

ITEM_0511.name: Guardian Fulgur Tail
ITEM_0511.expl: A Guardian Fulgur Anjanath tail. Packed with thick muscles that help it maintain balance.

ITEM_0512.name: Guardian Fulgur Gem
ITEM_0512.expl: A rare jewel that developed within a Guardian Fulgur Anjanath. Said to hold the might of the heavens.

ITEM_0513.name: Herbivore Carapace
ITEM_0513.expl: A thick carapace from an herbivore. Even the smallest ones are incredibly durable.

ITEM_0514.name: Bulaqchi Carapace
ITEM_0514.expl: A high-quality Bulaqchi carapace. Easy to process and incredibly tough.

ITEM_0515.name: Monster Fluid
ITEM_0515.expl: A liquid bugs suck from monsters. Mixes with insect fluids to form an adhesive.

ITEM_0516.name: Monster Broth
ITEM_0516.expl: A broth made from only the thickest of a monster's juices. Quite rich.

ITEM_0517.name: Talioth Scale+
ITEM_0517.expl: A high-quality Talioth scale. Built to survive fierce battles, but still not much to look at.

ITEM_0518.name: Wingdrake Hide+
ITEM_0518.expl: A rare material carved from wingdrakes. It's both tough and easy to work with.

ITEM_0519.name: Piragill Fin
ITEM_0519.expl: A Piragill fin. Its sharp edge cuts into prey like a knife through butter.

ITEM_0520.name: Piragill Fin+
ITEM_0520.expl: A high-quality Piragill fin. A deep scarlet, it will slice flesh at the slightest touch.

ITEM_0522.name: Kranodath Skull
ITEM_0522.expl: A Kranodath skull. Its incredible resilience makes it a great material for armor.

ITEM_0523.name: Kranodath Skull+
ITEM_0523.expl: An extra hard Kranodath skull. So tough that it won't crack even if you pound on it with all your might.

ITEM_0524.name: Comaqchi Shell
ITEM_0524.expl: A Comaqchi shell. Incredibly smooth with an attractive luster.

ITEM_0525.name: Comaqchi Carapace
ITEM_0525.expl: A high-quality Comaqchi shell. Its glorious color bewitches all those who see it.

ITEM_0528.name: Guardian Seikret Feather
ITEM_0528.expl: A Guardian Seikret feather. Strong enough to deflect blades.

ITEM_0529.name: Guardian Seikret Feather+
ITEM_0529.expl: A high-quality Guardian Seikret feather. Astoundingly lightweight, yet perfectly resilient.

ITEM_0530.name: Congalala Pelt
ITEM_0530.expl: The pink fur of a Congalala. The tufts of fluffy hair are an ideal material for clothing.

ITEM_0531.name: Congalala Claw
ITEM_0531.expl: The long claw of a Congalala. Large and sharp, it gouges anything it touches.

ITEM_0532.name: Congalala Fang
ITEM_0532.expl: A Congalala incisor. While blunt, it is tough enough to crush even the hardest of substances.

ITEM_0533.name: Vibrant Pelt
ITEM_0533.expl: Vibrant hair that grows on the head of a Congalala. The lovely colors are proof of its position in its pack.

ITEM_0534.name: Congalala Certificate
ITEM_0534.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Congalala. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0535.name: Congalala Pelt+
ITEM_0535.expl: High-quality Congalala fur. Stout and resilient, an important crafting material once processed.

ITEM_0536.name: Congalala Claw+
ITEM_0536.expl: A long, hard, sharp claw from the wildest of Congalala, and no less tricky to manage than its source.

ITEM_0537.name: Congalala Fang+
ITEM_0537.expl: An extra large Congalala fang. Its sturdiness is better suited for crushing than tearing.

ITEM_0538.name: Vibrant Pelt+
ITEM_0538.expl: Vibrant hair from a Congalala's head. The tuft works as crown of sorts, establishing its status as leader.

ITEM_0539.name: Nerscylla Shell
ITEM_0539.expl: The outer shell of a Nerscylla. Extremely light, with a distinctly aposematic coloration.

ITEM_0540.name: Nerscylla Chelicera
ITEM_0540.expl: The retractable venomous fang of a Nerscylla. Handle with care!

ITEM_0541.name: Nerscylla Claw
ITEM_0541.expl: A lightweight, scythe-like claw that enables the Nerscylla's swift and deadly attacks.

ITEM_0542.name: Nerscylla Spike
ITEM_0542.expl: A dorsal spike and poison sac used to drip poison onto prey passing under the Nerscylla's nest.

ITEM_0543.name: Nerscylla Certificate
ITEM_0543.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Nerscylla. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0544.name: Nerscylla Carapace
ITEM_0544.expl: A sturdy Nerscylla carapace. The porcelain-white material is highly prized, particularly among women.

ITEM_0545.name: Nerscylla Claw+
ITEM_0545.expl: This keen Nerscylla claw lashes out from the shadows to claim an ever-growing list of victims.

ITEM_0546.name: Nerscylla Spike+
ITEM_0546.expl: An especially large Nerscylla spike, prized more for its lethal poison sac than its sharpness.

ITEM_0547.name: Nerscylla Certificate S
ITEM_0547.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Nerscylla. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0548.name: Kut-Ku Scale+
ITEM_0548.expl: Quality scale from a Yian Kut-Ku. Its size and weight make it even more impressive than normal.

ITEM_0549.name: Kut-Ku Carapace
ITEM_0549.expl: Unyielding Yian Kut-Ku carapace. Its vivid red hue won't dim even when exposed to intense heat.

ITEM_0550.name: Kut-Ku Ear
ITEM_0550.expl: The distinctive ear of a Yian Kut-Ku. Stretchy and resistant to fire, it makes fine armor lining.

ITEM_0551.name: Giant Beak
ITEM_0551.expl: The massive beak of a Yian Kut-Ku. Sturdy enough to peck through even the rockiest of terrain.

ITEM_0552.name: Kut-Ku Wing
ITEM_0552.expl: Quality Yian Kut-Ku wing membrane. A triple threat of sturdiness, flexibility, and fire resistance.

ITEM_0553.name: Yian Kut-Ku Certificate S
ITEM_0553.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Yian Kut-Ku. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0554.name: Rubbery Hide
ITEM_0554.expl: Elastic, electricity-resistant hide worn by a Nerscylla. Thought to be from another monster.

ITEM_0555.name: Rubbery Hide+
ITEM_0555.expl: The quality hide of a Gypceros. The baggy, stretchy feel of it is oddly pleasing to the wearer.

ITEM_0556.name: Gypceros Wing
ITEM_0556.expl: A quality Gypceros wing membrane. Offers the same shock and poison protection—now with comfy stretch!

ITEM_0557.name: Gypceros Head
ITEM_0557.expl: The uniquely shaped head of a Gypceros. A must-have for Gypceros lovers!

ITEM_0558.name: Gypceros Tail
ITEM_0558.expl: The tail of a Gypceros. The most pliant body part, and thus the most difficult part to damage.

ITEM_0559.name: Gypceros Certificate S
ITEM_0559.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Gypceros. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0560.name: Bird Wyvern Gem
ITEM_0560.expl: A valuable gem that can be harvested from bird wyverns. Said to fetch a high price on the market.

ITEM_0561.name: Dash Extract
ITEM_0561.expl: A mysterious substance culled from certain monsters that increases endurance.

ITEM_0562.name: Rathian Certificate S
ITEM_0562.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Rathian. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0563.name: Blangonga Pelt+
ITEM_0563.expl: Fine fur from a Blangonga. Its springy resilience and warmth make it prized in cold regions.

ITEM_0564.name: Blangonga Fang+
ITEM_0564.expl: A Blangonga canine. As large as a human thigh, it's basically a weapon already.

ITEM_0565.name: Blangonga Whisker
ITEM_0565.expl: A glorious mustache is the mark and pride of a Blangonga leader, a symbol of its might.

ITEM_0566.name: Blangonga Tail
ITEM_0566.expl: The tail of a Blangonga. The silky, lustrous coat is heavenly to the touch.

ITEM_0567.name: Blangonga Certificate S
ITEM_0567.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Blangonga. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0568.name: Gravios Carapace
ITEM_0568.expl: The sturdy carapace of a Gravios. Fused with ore by intense heat, it has grown abnormally tough.

ITEM_0569.name: Gravios Skull
ITEM_0569.expl: The head armor of a Gravios, hardened by its own heat. Makes it hard to work with, too.

ITEM_0570.name: Gravios Pleura+
ITEM_0570.expl: Shell that covers a Gravios's torso. It's grown so thick over time that average attacks do nothing to it.

ITEM_0571.name: Gravios Medulla
ITEM_0571.expl: Though hard to extract and hard to craft, the brain stem is an especially precious Gravios part.

ITEM_0572.name: Gravios Wing
ITEM_0572.expl: The hefty wing of a Gravios. Recently, the demand and value of the material has been rising.

ITEM_0573.name: Gravios Certificate S
ITEM_0573.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Gravios. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0582.name: Rathalos Scale+
ITEM_0582.expl: An extraordinarily durable scale carved from the body of a Rathalos.

ITEM_0583.name: Rathalos Carapace
ITEM_0583.expl: This Rathalos carapace emanates a nobility befitting the King of the Skies.

ITEM_0584.name: Rathalos Wing
ITEM_0584.expl: The wing of a Rathalos. Skilled artisans can craft it into strong equipment.

ITEM_0585.name: Rathalos Tail
ITEM_0585.expl: A severed Rathalos tail covered in plates and keen spines. It has any number of uses.

ITEM_0586.name: Rathalos Ruby
ITEM_0586.expl: A rare, precious gem from inside a Rathalos. Almost too nice to use.

ITEM_0587.name: Rathalos Certificate S
ITEM_0587.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Rathalos. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0588.name: Gore Magala Scale+
ITEM_0588.expl: A deep black scale that seems to devour surrounding light, not reflect it.

ITEM_0589.name: Gore Magala Carapace
ITEM_0589.expl: The Gore Magala's handsome black suit of armor, said to negate all blows.

ITEM_0590.name: Gore Magala Wing+
ITEM_0590.expl: A horrifying wing that casts a hungry shadow over prey and drives them insane.

ITEM_0591.name: Gore Magala Ripclaw+
ITEM_0591.expl: A claw from a Gore Magala's second foreleg. It inflicts Frenzy and generations of suffering.

ITEM_0592.name: Gore Magala Tail
ITEM_0592.expl: A pliant tail covered in reverse scales that strikes like a whip, not a blade.

ITEM_0593.name: Gore Magala Feeler+
ITEM_0593.expl: A well-honed sensory organ from a Gore Magala that oozes violet melancholy from its infected tip.

ITEM_0594.name: Gore Magala Nyctgem
ITEM_0594.expl: A pure, jet-black jewel that imprisons and swallows all nearby light.

ITEM_0595.name: Gore Magala Certificate S
ITEM_0595.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Gore Magala. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0596.name: Frenzy Crystal
ITEM_0596.expl: An unsettling crystal wreathed in Frenzied power. Handle with extreme care.

ITEM_0597.name: Conga Pelt
ITEM_0597.expl: A Conga pelt. Sturdy and soft to the touch but must be deodorized before it's processed.

ITEM_0598.name: Conga Pelt+
ITEM_0598.expl: A high-quality Conga pelt. The thick fur can be used to make long-lasting equipment.

ITEM_0599.name: Vespoid Shell
ITEM_0599.expl: A Vespoid shell. If processed correctly, it can become just as tough as a wyvern's hide.

ITEM_0600.name: Vespoid Carapace
ITEM_0600.expl: The hard carapace of a Vespoid. It takes on a unique quality once processed.

ITEM_0601.name: Vespoid Wing
ITEM_0601.expl: The wing of a Vespoid. Extremely difficult to process and produces widely varying results.

ITEM_0602.name: Vespoid Innerwing
ITEM_0602.expl: The innerwing of a Vespoid. Sharp and elegant, like a blade.

ITEM_0603.name: Blango Pelt+
ITEM_0603.expl: A high-quality Blango pelt. Difficult to process, but valuable nonetheless.

ITEM_0604.name: Lightcrystal
ITEM_0604.expl: A precious and extremely hard substance with a faint glow. Sometimes used for crafting tools.

ITEM_0605.name: Novacrystal
ITEM_0605.expl: High quality Lightcrystal. Highly coveted for its rarity, it's used for only the finest of metalworking.

ITEM_0606.name: Firestone
ITEM_0606.expl: Ore that is scorching even at room temperature. Its heat can be used to fuse materials.

ITEM_0607.name: Firecell Stone
ITEM_0607.expl: A magma-like deposit that only trained hands can handle. Armor made from it is first-class.

ITEM_0608.name: Fucium Ore
ITEM_0608.expl: A mysterious metal found in the Ruins of Wyveria, capable of fusing any other materials together.

ITEM_0609.name: Icium
ITEM_0609.expl: Precious metal from the Iceshard Cliffs. Shines bright white when the light catches it.

ITEM_0610.name: Guardian Fulgur Certificate S
ITEM_0610.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Guardian Fulgur Anjanath. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0611.name: Congalala Certificate S
ITEM_0611.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Congalala. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0612.name: Charred Oilbone
ITEM_0612.expl: A bone found in the Oilwell Basin. Covered in a thick coat of oil that built up over many years.

ITEM_0613.name: Frozen Icebone
ITEM_0613.expl: A bone found in the Iceshard Cliffs. Tempered over millennia deep within the frozen earth.

ITEM_0614.name: Tough Guardian Bone
ITEM_0614.expl: A bone found in the Ruins of Wyveria. Its peculiar shape is unique to the local wildlife.

ITEM_0615.name: Quality Bone
ITEM_0615.expl: A bone used as crafting material. Its ease of use and hardness allow it to be shaped into better gear.

ITEM_0616.name: Crushed Crystal
ITEM_0616.expl: A shard of crystal carved from the carcass of a Guardian. Can be used as a melding material.

ITEM_0617.name: Cloudy Crystal
ITEM_0617.expl: A hazy crystal carved from the carcass of a Guardian. Can be used as a melding material.

ITEM_0618.name: Coruscating Crystal
ITEM_0618.expl: A glittering crystal carved from the carcass of a Guardian. Can be used as a melding material.

ITEM_0619.name: Flame Sac
ITEM_0619.expl: A monster organ filled with flammable powder. Handle with extreme care.

ITEM_0620.name: Inferno Sac
ITEM_0620.expl: A monster organ filled with powder that ignites if it so much as touches air. Danger!

ITEM_0621.name: Aqua Sac
ITEM_0621.expl: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve water.

ITEM_0622.name: Torrent Sac
ITEM_0622.expl: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve copious amounts of water.

ITEM_0624.name: Thunder Sac
ITEM_0624.expl: A monster organ that can store up large amounts of high voltage electricity.

ITEM_0625.name: Frost Sac
ITEM_0625.expl: A monster organ filled with extremely cold fluid. Handle with care.

ITEM_0626.name: Freezer Sac
ITEM_0626.expl: A monster organ with tremendous chilling power. Flash-freezes its surroundings.

ITEM_0627.name: Poison Sac
ITEM_0627.expl: A monster organ filled with a lethal toxin. Handle with extreme care.

ITEM_0628.name: Toxin Sac
ITEM_0628.expl: A monster organ filled with an extremely potent toxin. Even one touch can be risky.

ITEM_0629.name: Lala Barina Mucus
ITEM_0629.expl: Body fluid from a Lala Barina. A sticky, red liquid that causes paralysis.

ITEM_0630.name: Lala Barina Mucus+
ITEM_0630.expl: Thick body fluid from a Lala Barina. As red as fresh blood, it contains a powerful paralytic.

ITEM_0631.name: Sleep Sac
ITEM_0631.expl: A monster organ filled with a knockout powder capable of inducing sleep.

ITEM_0632.name: Coma Sac
ITEM_0632.expl: A monster organ filled with a dangerous powder. One whiff can induce a coma.

ITEM_0633.name: Guardian Blood
ITEM_0633.expl: Guardian blood containing an unknown substance. A valuable research material.

ITEM_0634.name: Guardian Blood+
ITEM_0634.expl: Guardian blood with rather peculiar properties. Requires further research.

ITEM_0635.name: Great Hibiscus
ITEM_0635.expl: A large, brightly colored flower found in the Ruins of Wyveria. Spreads its seeds through the air.

ITEM_0636.name: Dalthydon Wool
ITEM_0636.expl: A product of Kunafa. Perfectly suited for desert life. Try bringing it to the Smithy.

ITEM_0637.name: Azuz Tanned Leather
ITEM_0637.expl: A product of Azuz. The leather is repeatedly repaired for extended use. Try taking it to the Smithy.

ITEM_0638.name: Suja Textiles
ITEM_0638.expl: A product of Suja. Its unique pattern has roots in Wyverian tradition. Try taking it to the Smithy.

ITEM_0639.name: Sild Cotton
ITEM_0639.expl: A product of Sild. A high-quality material that can be used as-is. Try bringing it to the Smithy.

ITEM_0640.name: Gajau Hide
ITEM_0640.expl: The hide of a Gajau. Covered in a thick slime that grants water resistance.

ITEM_0641.name: Speartuna Fin
ITEM_0641.expl: The sharp fin of a Speartuna. Might be useful for something if you bring it to the Smithy.

ITEM_0642.name: Commission Ticket
ITEM_0642.expl: A ticket in the image of a hunter who traveled to the New World. Try taking it to the Smithy.

ITEM_0644.name: Mimiphyta Ticket
ITEM_0644.expl: A ticket depicting the ecology of Mimiphyta. Give it to the Smithy to get special equipment.

ITEM_0645.name: Mystery Orb - Sword
ITEM_0645.expl: A sphere with faint power that is revealed through appraisal. Becomes an offensive decoration.

ITEM_0646.name: Glowing Orb - Sword
ITEM_0646.expl: A sphere with hidden power that can be revealed through appraisal. Becomes an offensive decoration.

ITEM_0647.name: Ancient Orb - Sword
ITEM_0647.expl: A sphere with incredible power that can be revealed through appraisal. Becomes an offensive decoration.

ITEM_0648.name: Armor Sphere
ITEM_0648.expl: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a tiny amount.

ITEM_0649.name: Armor Sphere+
ITEM_0649.expl: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a small amount.

ITEM_0650.name: Advanced Armor Sphere
ITEM_0650.expl: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it.

ITEM_0651.name: Hard Armor Sphere
ITEM_0651.expl: A rigid, high-density armor sphere. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a great amount.

ITEM_0652.name: Rocksteady Mantle
ITEM_0652.expl: Negates damage reactions, protects hearing, grants wind and tremor resistance, and reduces damage.

ITEM_0653.name: Mending Mantle
ITEM_0653.expl: Steadily restores health over a set amount of time.

ITEM_0654.name: Evasion Mantle
ITEM_0654.expl: Upon just evading a blow, triggers a special evasive maneuver that boosts attack and alters combos.

ITEM_0655.name: Corrupted Mantle
ITEM_0655.expl: Decreases health, but raises affinity and weapon stats. Attack and affinity further increased in certain conditions.

ITEM_0656.name: Wyvern Egg
ITEM_0656.expl: A flying wyvern's egg. Deliver it back to camp...if you can.

ITEM_0657.name: Charred Lizard
ITEM_0657.expl: A lizard charred crispy by Wudwuds. Removes all traces of poison and restores both health and stamina.

ITEM_0658.name: Wild Jerky
ITEM_0658.expl: Dried meat beloved for its wild flavor and toughness. Increases natural healing and cures bleeding.

ITEM_0660.name: Catalyst
ITEM_0660.expl: Works with other materials to enhance their effects. Cannot be used by itself.

ITEM_0661.name: Gunpowder
ITEM_0661.expl: A dangerous substance that explodes when struck or heated. Used in Large Barrel Bombs.

ITEM_0662.name: Small Barrel
ITEM_0662.expl: A small, empty barrel. Combine with fire herbs to make it into a bomb.

ITEM_0663.name: Large Barrel
ITEM_0663.expl: A large, empty barrel. Combine with gunpowder to make it into a bomb.

ITEM_0664.name: Spider Web
ITEM_0664.expl: A very sticky web. Used to craft pitfall traps.

ITEM_0665.name: Net
ITEM_0665.expl: A sturdy net that supports a certain amount of weight without breaking. Perfect for pitfall traps.

ITEM_0666.name: Gunpowderfish Scale
ITEM_0666.expl: A Gunpowderfish scale. Combine with a large barrel bomb to dramatically increase its firepower.

ITEM_0667.name: Burst Arowana Scale
ITEM_0667.expl: A Burst Arowana scale. Combine with Normal Ammo to make a large amount of Slicing Ammo.

ITEM_0668.name: Bomb Arowana Scale
ITEM_0668.expl: A Bomb Arowana scale. Combine with Normal Ammo to make a large amount of Sticky Ammo.

ITEM_0669.name: Gilded Scale
ITEM_0669.expl: A Goldenfry scale. Used by artisans in their crafts.

ITEM_0670.name: Golden Scale
ITEM_0670.expl: A Goldenfish scale. They shimmer like only pure gold can.

ITEM_0671.name: Platinum Scale
ITEM_0671.expl: A Platinumfish scale. They give off a beautiful gleam.

ITEM_0673.name: Steel Melding Ticket
ITEM_0673.expl: A ticket used by Wyverians. Hand it over when melding decorations to get a slight discount.

ITEM_0674.name: Silver Melding Ticket
ITEM_0674.expl: A ticket used by Wyverians. Hand it over when melding decorations to get a discount.

ITEM_0675.name: Steel Relic Ticket
ITEM_0675.expl: A ticket used by Wyverians. Hand it over when melding relics to get a slight discount.

ITEM_0676.name: Silver Relic Ticket
ITEM_0676.expl: A ticket used by Wyverians. Hand it over when melding relics to get a discount.

ITEM_0677.name: Steel Egg
ITEM_0677.expl: An egg of glittering steel. Rare but useless to hunters. Sells for a good price.

ITEM_0678.name: Silver Egg
ITEM_0678.expl: An egg of glittering silver. Rare but useless to hunters. Sells for a very good price.

ITEM_0679.name: Golden Egg
ITEM_0679.expl: An egg of glittering gold. Valuable but useless to hunters. Sells for a fortune.

ITEM_0680.name: Heavy Armor Sphere
ITEM_0680.expl: A solid, high-density armor sphere. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a vast amount.

ITEM_0681.name: Monster Keenbone
ITEM_0681.expl: Bone obtained from high-rank large monsters. It has a razor sharp tip that retains its strength after forging.

ITEM_0682.name: Monster Hardbone
ITEM_0682.expl: Precious bone obtained from high rank large monsters. Their rarity makes them highly sought after.

ITEM_0683.name: Stoutbone
ITEM_0683.expl: The bone of a large, high ranking monster. Very sturdy.

ITEM_0684.name: Great Stoutbone
ITEM_0684.expl: The bone of a large, high ranking monster. Extremely solid and durable.

ITEM_0685.name: Hunter Symbol I
ITEM_0685.expl: Proof that you've hunted a tempered monster, certifying your strength.

ITEM_0686.name: Hunter Symbol II
ITEM_0686.expl: Proof that you've hunted a fierce tempered monster, certifying your fearlessness.

ITEM_0687.name: Hunter Symbol III
ITEM_0687.expl: Proof that you've hunted a vicious tempered monster, certifying your heroism.

ITEM_0688.name: Gold Melding Ticket
ITEM_0688.expl: A ticket used by Wyverians. Hand it over when melding decorations to get a great discount.

ITEM_0689.name: Gold Relic Ticket
ITEM_0689.expl: A ticket used by Wyverians. Hand it over when melding relics to get a great discount.

ITEM_0690.name: Guardian Pelt
ITEM_0690.expl: Contains an unknown substance. It has lost any color it previously had and courses with energy.

ITEM_0691.name: Guardian Pelt+
ITEM_0691.expl: A high-quality Guardian pelt. Exceptionally smooth and tough.

ITEM_0692.name: Drearisite
ITEM_0692.expl: A mysterious material smelted in Azuz. Has been used to make equipment since ancient times.

ITEM_0693.name: Specklite
ITEM_0693.expl: A mysterious material smelted in Azuz. Not as pure as it could be, but still of impeccable quality.

ITEM_0694.name: Argecite
ITEM_0694.expl: A mysterious material smelted in Azuz. It's apparently primarily used in high-quality equipment.

ITEM_0695.name: Oricalcite
ITEM_0695.expl: A mysterious, high-quality material smelted in Azuz. Equipment made from it is second to none.

ITEM_0696.name: Common Wood Minnow
ITEM_0696.expl: A common wooden lure shaped like a small fish. Good for any kind of fish.

ITEM_0697.name: Golden Bughead
ITEM_0697.expl: A lure that looks like a shining beetle. Good for catching gaudy fish, like Goldenfish.

ITEM_0698.name: Emerald Jitterbait
ITEM_0698.expl: A lure with a blade made of ore. Good for catching useful fish, like Sushifish.

ITEM_0699.name: Tuff Joint Bait
ITEM_0699.expl: A lure shaped like a Cephalos. Good for catching large, swift fish, like Gastronome Tuna.

ITEM_0700.name: Duster Rig
ITEM_0700.expl: A lure shaped like a Starduster. Good for catching fish that like dark or muddy places, like Gajau.

ITEM_0701.name: Tentacle Jig
ITEM_0701.expl: A lure made with thorngrass. Good for catching aquatic creatures that have tentacles or feelers.

ITEM_0702.name: Close-range Coating
ITEM_0702.expl: A coating designed to deal more damage to nearby targets, at the cost of a reduced maximum range.

ITEM_0703.name: Power Coating
ITEM_0703.expl: A coating that increases the attack power of arrows.

ITEM_0704.name: Pierce Coating
ITEM_0704.expl: A coating that increases piercing ability. Depending on the monster, it can deal multiple hits.

ITEM_0705.name: Paralysis Coating
ITEM_0705.expl: A coating that applies paralysis effects to arrows.

ITEM_0706.name: Poison Coating
ITEM_0706.expl: A coating that applies poison effects to arrows.

ITEM_0707.name: Sleep Coating
ITEM_0707.expl: A coating that applies sleep effects to arrows.

ITEM_0708.name: Blast Coating
ITEM_0708.expl: A coating that applies explosive powder to arrows.

ITEM_0709.name: Exhaust Coating
ITEM_0709.expl: A coating that applies a fluid which induces exhaust to arrows.

ITEM_0710.name: Whetfish Fin+
ITEM_0710.expl: A fish fin used to sharpen weapons. Works better than a whetstone and can be reused if you're lucky.

ITEM_0711.name: Great Sushifish Scale
ITEM_0711.expl: Scale from a Sushifish. Eat to get a large health/natural healing boost or to treat bleeding.

ITEM_0712.name: Old Weapon Shard - Blade
ITEM_0712.expl: A piece of a discarded, old blade. Needs to be appraised.

ITEM_0713.name: Old Weapon Shard - Tube
ITEM_0713.expl: A cylindrical part of an old weapon that's been thrown away. Needs to be appraised.

ITEM_0714.name: Old Weapon Shard - Disc
ITEM_0714.expl: A disc-like part of an old weapon that's been thrown away. Needs to be appraised.

ITEM_0715.name: Old Weapon Shard - Device
ITEM_0715.expl: A part of an old weapon that has some sort of device on it. Needs to be appraised.

ITEM_0724.name: Gracium
ITEM_0724.expl: Precious ore from the Iceshard Cliffs. Swathed in frigid air that shines pale blue when the light catches it.

ITEM_0725.name: Wyverian Bloodstone Shard
ITEM_0725.expl: Obtained from destroying a tempered wound. Has a deep sanguine hue. Can be used as a melding material.

ITEM_0726.name: Wyverian Bloodstone (S)
ITEM_0726.expl: Obtained from destroying a tempered wound. Has a deep sanguine hue. Can be used as a melding material.

ITEM_0727.name: Wyverian Bloodstone
ITEM_0727.expl: Obtained from destroying a tempered wound. Has a deep sanguine hue. Can be used as a melding material.

ITEM_0728.name: Wyverian Bloodstone (L)
ITEM_0728.expl: Obtained from destroying a tempered wound. Larger than most of its type. Can be used as a melding material.

ITEM_0729.name: Wyverian Bloodstone Chunk
ITEM_0729.expl: Obtained from destroying a tempered wound. One of the largest of its kind. Can be used as a melding material.

ITEM_0730.name: Balahara Black Pearl
ITEM_0730.expl: A jewel formed from ore that spent years inside a Balahara. Bewitchingly beautiful.

ITEM_0731.name: Guardian Rathalos Ruby
ITEM_0731.expl: A rare jewel that developed in a Guardian Rathalos' body. Said to wield the power of an inferno.

ITEM_0732.name: Guardian Rathalos Plate
ITEM_0732.expl: A plate from a Guardian Rathalos. Strengthened by the flow of energy, its inherent heat blazes forth.

ITEM_0733.name: Jin Dahaad Tail
ITEM_0733.expl: The tail of a Jin Dahaad. Has a cooling organ that continues to make cold air even when severed.

ITEM_0734.name: Expedition Headgear Ticket
ITEM_0734.expl: A ticket inscribed with the emblem of the expedition. Give it to the Smithy to get special equipment.
